_header: Now brother Walter brother mine after the fleshless kind
_description: Orm, Ormulum — 20,000 lines of metrical sermons

BodJunius1.First Lines:
Nu broþerr Wallterr broþerr min afterr þe flaeshess
                    kinde…
BodJunius1.Note:
Seventeenth-century transcript is London,  Lambeth Palace Library 783 (containing
                    portions missing from the Bodleian text), ed. Ker (1940)
XKer,  Neil Ripley. 
             “Unpublished Parts of the Ormulum Printed From MS. Lambeth 783.” 
             Medium Ævum
         9 (1940): 1-22,
                    1.

White,  Robert Meadows,
                        ed.

Emerson,  Oliver F.

Hall,  Joseph.
